name: IT Girnos
tagline: We are IT Professionals, Who Live Our Work
description:
Company IT Girnos specialises in Fintech, payments, credit cards payments systems, parking and parking enforcement systems, e-commerce, and reservations systems.
We deliver value to client by building not only mobile applications or web sites but also intranet solutions, big data analysis and expert systems. Our clients challenge  us with unsolvable problems, and we always deliver!
